txt.en: Collect teeth from trolls at Barad Nemorn ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Barad Nemorn is located near where the Morgulduin meets the Anduin in Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should take teeth from trolls you defeat in Barad Nemorn to show the Morgul-host that their enemies are fell and fearless.
Bring the troll teeth to a Ranger at Faramir's Look-out
A number of trolls gather at Barad Nemorn and should be dealt with to prove your might.
'You are indeed a fearsome warrior! Let the Morgul-host tremble when you come nigh! Seeing this pile of troll-teeth truly raises my spirits.'

Barad Nemorn is located near where the Morgulduin meets the Anduin in Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should take teeth from trolls you defeat in Barad Nemorn to show the Morgul-host that their enemies are fell and fearless.
Faramir's Look-out is located south-east of Osgiliath.\n\nYou should bring the troll teeth to a Ranger at Faramir's Look-out.
A number of trolls gather at Barad Nemorn. Defeating trolls and ripping out their teeth should show the Morgul-host that their enemies are fell and fearless.
Take teeth from defeated trolls at Barad Nemorn
